page.title: 02Tilstock and District contd.
page.content: School, the Church and The Horseshoes. Most of the housing development lies to the northern side of the road from Tilstock to Prees Heath where 30 council houses stand, there has also been in 1984 a new housing development to the south side of the road. There is also an old footpath leading from the school field straight over to the south west corner of Brown moss. This goes over the fields down and up over the Railway by means of steps and then crosses the A41 by the car sales and then up the hill to Brown moss.
